### TeX primitives

\topskip=40pt
\leftskip 10pt 
\rightskip 0pt plus 1 fill
\parskip=10pt
\parindent=0pt
\parfillskip=10pt
\baselineskip=12pt plus1fil
\baselineskip24pt
\lineskip=10pt
\lineskiplimit=10pt
\textheight=220mm
\textwidth=160mm
\paperheight=297mm
\paperwidth=210mm
\topmargin=-5mm
\oddsidemargin=-1mm
\headheight=12pt
\headsep=12pt
\marginparpush=10pt
\marginparwidth=10pt
\marginparsep=10pt
\footskip=10pt
\hoffset=0pt
\voffset=0pt
\setlength{\baselineskip}{12pt plus1fil}

### \tikzstyle

\tikzstyle{process} = [rectangle, minimum width=3cm, minimum height=1cm, text centered, draw=black, fill=orange!30]
\tikzstyle{complex} = [rectangle, path picture={\draw (0,0) -- (1,1); \fill[blue] (0.5,0.5) circle (0.1);}, fill=red!20]
\tikzstyle{arrow} = [thick, ->]
\tikzstyle{nested} = [rectangle, label={[fill=white, inner sep=1pt]above:{Text with {nested} content}}, fill=gray!30]

Some text \tikzstyle{inline} = [minimum size=1cm] and \textbf{more text}.

---

\tikzstyle{process} = [rectangle, minimum width=3cm, minimum height=1cm, text centered, draw=black, fill=orange!30]
\tikzstyle{complex} = [rectangle, path picture={\draw (0,0) -- (1,1); \fill[blue] (0.5,0.5) circle (0.1);}, fill=red!20]
\tikzstyle{arrow} = [thick, ->]
\tikzstyle{nested} = [rectangle, label={[fill=white, inner sep=1pt]above:{Text with {nested} content}}, fill=gray!30]

<s>Fbzr grkg</s> \tikzstyle{inline} = [minimum size=1cm] <s>naq</s> \textbf{<s>zber grkg</s>}.
